Uses of Interface
org.restlet.component.Component

Packages that use Component
org.restlet.component Units of software instructions and internal state. 
org.restlet.connector Mechanisms that enable communication between components. 
 

Uses of Component in org.restlet.component
 

Subinterfaces of Component in org.restlet.component
 interface Gateway
          Intermediary component providing transparent encapsulation of other services.
 interface OriginServer
          Definitive source for representations of resources in a governed namespace.
 interface Proxy
          Intermediary component, selected by a client, providing encapsulation of other services.
 interface RestletContainer
          Origin server that contains restlets or maplets.
 interface RestletServer
          Origin server composed of restlets containers.
 interface UserAgent
          Request initiator and ultimate recipient of the response.
 

Classes in org.restlet.component that implement Component
 class DefaultRestletContainer
          Default restlet container that can be easily subclassed.
 class DefaultRestletServer
          Default restlet server that can be easily subclassed.
